column9:
Thank you for your email.
I will be on annual leave until the 10th January 2011.
Should your email require urgent attention please contact our friendly Reception team at the Adelaide Royal Coach on 08 8362 5676 who would be pleased to assist you.

For all else – I will action upon my return to the office.

Thank you for your patience – have a very Merry Christmas and a safe and Happy New Year.

Kind Regards.
Felicity Martin
Assistant Manager/Functions Manager
Adelaide Royal Coach
Phone 08 8362 5676
Email felicity@countryclubs.com.au

www.countryclubs.com.au
